mapper.select: SELECT EMP.EMPLOYEE_NO, EMP.EMPLOYEE_NAME, TO_CHAR(ATT.ATTENDANCE_IN, 'MM/DD hh24:mi:ss') AS ATTENDANCE_IN, TO_CHAR(ATT.ATTENDANCE_OUT, 'MM/DD hh24:mi:ss') AS ATTENDANCE_OUT FROM EMPLOYEE_ATTENDANCE_TBL ATT JOIN EMPLOYEE_TBL EMP ON EMP.EMPLOYEE_NO = ATT.EMPLOYEE_NO WHERE EMP.EMPLOYEE_NO = #{employeeNo} AND ATTENDANCE_DATE = TO_DATE(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
SELECT * FROM EMPLOYEE_ATTENDANCE_TBL WHERE EMPLOYEE_NO = #{employeeNo} AND ATTENDANCE_DATE = SYSDATE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EMPLOYEE_ATTENDANCE_TBL VALUES (#{employeeNo}, null, null, TO_DATE(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))
